channel.title: CVE Feed for Kofi Mokome -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Kofi Mokome -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-39647|2024-08-02T18:19:11.654Z -- kofi%20mokome -- message%20filter%20for%20contact%20form%207
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Kofi Mokome Message Filter for Contact Form 7 allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Message Filter for Contact Form 7: from n/a through 1.6.1.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-39647|2024-08-01T22:09:41.754Z -- kofi%20mokome -- message%20filter%20for%20contact%20form%207
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Kofi Mokome Message Filter for Contact Form 7 allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Message Filter for Contact Form 7: from n/a through 1.6.1.1.
